name: Hebrew Vowel Blaster
description: This is a Space Invaders-esque game designed to (hopefully) help kids learn Hebrew vowel sound. The goal of the game is to shoot down all of the Hebrew vowels with the correct English sound, and to be as accurate as possible to get a high score. This game isn't very polished, but functionally it's all there. In the downloads I have included a text file with the source code for this game in case anyone wants to explore it (it's the txt file).
